verses.1: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
verses.2: And the earth was waste and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep: and the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
verses.3: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.

verses.16: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth on him should not perish, but have eternal life.
